create2(bytes,bytes).details: create2 hashes the userSalt with msg.sender, then uses the CREATE2 opcode to deterministically create a contract

documentation.text: @dev create2 hashes the userSalt with msg.sender, then uses the CREATE2 opcode to deterministically create a contract
Contract factory that facilitates predfictable deployment addresses
